item.title: trdsql File format conversion
item.description: TRDSQL describes files such as CSV as a tool for processing SQL, but can also be used as a tool for simply converting file formats. In that case, SQL is enough to remember the following fixed phrases. Output all rows and columns in the file. SELECT * FROM fileName After that, if you specify the input format (-i …) and the output format (-o …) as the option, you can convert the file format.
